question.body: Because the structural and functional classification is based on two different characteristics, a single neuron will have both classifications. Which of the following is correct?

response.feedback: Correct. These association neruons with multiple dendrites communicate between sensory and motor neurons as well as among themselves in central nervous system.
Incorrect. Bipolar neurons are rare sensory neurons.
Incorrect, most are unipolar with one cell extension with a branch from sensory receptor to cell body in ganglion and a branch from cell body to central nervous system.
Incorrect, most are multipolar, with many dendrites and cell body in the central nervous system and only the axon extending out into the body to muscles or glands.
Incorrect, bipolar neuron classification has nothing to do with the psychiatric diagnosis of the disorder; bipolar neurons are rare sensory neurons.
